name: Sharpedo
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”

poke_body.name: Rough Skin
poke_body.effect: If Sharpedo is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if Sharpedo is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Strike Wound
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has 2 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage. This attack damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.
